COVID-19 大流行是否增加了有酒精使用障碍史的人的醉酒率？ COVID-19 相关压力源如何改变醉酒频率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Did-the-COVID-19-pandemic-increase-drunkness-among-people-with-a-history-of-alcohol-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Did-the-COVID-19-pandemic-increase-drunkness-among-people-with-a-history-of-alcohol-use-disorder.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdcae550-dd50-451c-9f51-018e528131b4 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 10:02:00 -0400 Did the COVID-19 pandemic increase drunkness among people with a history of alcohol use disorder?

Owlstone Medical 在二期临床试验中招募第一位患者，通过呼吸活检早期发现肺癌Owlstone Medical 是用于早期疾病检测和精准医学应用的呼吸活检®的全球领导者，今天宣布在第一阶段成功实现关键安全性和概念验证里程碑后，招募第一位患者进入其 EVOLUTION 第二阶段临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Owlstone-Medical-recruits-first-病人-in-phase-2-clinical-trial-for-the-early-detection-of-lung-cancer-通过呼吸活检.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Owlstone-Medical-recruits-first-病人-in-phase-2-clinical-trial-for-the-early-detection-of-lung-cancer-通过呼吸活检.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d812b23-5b33-4d66-909e-8c878d0e3c9a Tue, 10 Oct 2023 07:38:00 -0400 Owlstone Medical recruits first patient in phase 2 clinical trial for the early detection of lung cancer through breath biopsy
使用人工智能和自然语言处理进行心理健康干预自然语言处理 (NLP) 用于检查心理健康干预措施 (MHI)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/The-use-of-artificial-intelligence-and-natural-language-processing-for-mental-health-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/The-use-of-artificial-intelligence-and-natural-language-processing-for-mental-health-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45d59f98-d476-4692-9f1b-1c3ffbea8d43 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 07:22:00 -0400 The use of artificial intelligence and natural language processing for mental health interventions
正念、抑郁和生命意义：有什么联系？生命意义（MIL）是否在正念和抑郁之间表现出连锁中介效应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Mindativity-depression-and-meaning-in-life-whate28099s-the-link.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Mindativity-depression-and-meaning-in-life-whate28099s-the-link.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09bf6f11-d730-492f-8c65-c107cdf39c5a Tue, 10 Oct 2023 06:57:00 -0400 Mindfulness, depression, and meaning in life: what’s the link?
比较持久影响：新冠肺炎后与非新冠肺炎急性呼吸道感染既往感染过 COVID-19 的个体与患有其他急性呼吸道感染 (ARI) 的个体之间的症状概况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Comparing-the- permanent-effects-post-COVID-vs-non-COVID-acute-respiratory-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Comparing-the- permanent-effects-post-COVID-vs-non-COVID-acute-respiratory-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7910e97-2a7a-4c10-8a36-56d7c445933c Tue, 10 Oct 2023 04:50:00 -0400 Comparing the lasting effects: post COVID vs. non-COVID acute respiratory infections
老年人中的 RSV：CDC 研究显示，虽然不如 COVID-19 常见，但影响更严重在 CDC 最近的一项 MMWR 研究中，研究人员发现，虽然在 60 岁以上的美国人中，呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 感染不如 COVID-19 和流感常见，但它们会导致更严重的临床结果。这一见解支持 CDC 关于老年人接种 RSV 疫苗的建议，强调其在预防严重呼吸道疾病方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/RSV-in-seniors-Less-common-than-COVID-19-but-hits-harder-CDC-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/RSV-in-seniors-Less-common-than-COVID-19-but-hits-harder-CDC-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02f75346-0305-4393-acd6-eec8af94e145 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 01:04:00 -0400 RSV in seniors: Less common than COVID-19, but hits harder, CDC study reveals
从源头上遏制流行病：呼吁采取积极主动的“同一个健康”方法最近的《公共科学图书馆病原体》评论强调，积极预防病原体从动物传播到人类，作为应对未来流行病的策略，倡导采取考虑人类、动物和环境相互关联的整体“同一个健康”方法。该研究强调了一级预防的重要性，将其与二级遏制区分开来，并强调了先发制人行动相对于反应性反应的经济和社会效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Halting-pandemics-at-the-source-The-call-for-a-proactive-One-Health-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Halting-pandemics-at-the-source-The-call-for-a-proactive-One-Health-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd89f2cf-e1cd-42c8-aac3-2e19193d6c8f Tue, 10 Oct 2023 00:48:00 -0400 Halting pandemics at the source: The call for a proactive 'One Health' approach
